channel.title: When i tried adding NPC drops
channel.description:
[code]Your server is now online. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2086) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:569) at server.main(server.java:164) Connection from 89-139-105-204.bb.netvision.net.il:2302 Hallowen: character file not found.[/code]
I get this error help me please

item.title: When i tried adding NPC drops
item.dc:creator: @Jonnydpickle Jonnydpickle
item.description:
@Jonnydpickle wrote:

Thanks Owned you rock
And also one more thing
when i have a command set to where only owner can do it then i add co owner
such as “add” and “getpass” it spams a message to him as if he was typing the command wrong like
name does not exist

@Jonnydpickle wrote:

well sense i dont wana spam topics
will you help with this error 2?
client.java:38: cannot find symbol
symbol : class string
location: class client

^
1 error
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

I wouldn’t know since I use arrays to load my NPC drops.

item.description:

do you think this
npcdrop = ##[tab]1111[tab]@@[tab]PPP
would work?

item.source: When i tried adding NPC drops

item.title: When i tried adding NPC drops
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

You are using a configuration (.cfg) file to load the NPC drops, right?

If that’s the case, you might have made the following mistakes in the .cfg file:

You used spaces instead of tabs to space out the lines.
Skipped a space
Basically make sure you used tab instead of space, and look over what you added closely.

If you can show me what you last added I could tell you where you went wrong.

Read full topic
